		'post_status' => 'publish'
	));

		update_post_meta($event_id, '_twec_event_start_date', $event_data['start_date']);
		update_post_meta($event_id, '_twec_event_start_time', $event_data['start_time']);
		update_post_meta($event_id, '_twec_event_end_date', $event_data['end_date']);
		update_post_meta($event_id, '_twec_event_end_time', $event_data['end_time']);
		
		// Set venue and organizer
		if ($event_data['venue']) {
			update_post_meta($event_id, '_twec_event_venue', $event_data['venue']);
		}
		if ($event_data['organizer']) {
			update_post_meta($event_id, '_twec_event_organizer', $event_data['organizer']);
		}
		
		// Set categories and tags
		if ($event_data['category']) {
			wp_set_post_terms($event_id, array($event_data['category']), 'twec_event_category');
		}
		if (!empty($event_data['tags'])) {
			wp_set_post_terms($event_id, $event_data['tags'], 'twec_event_tag');
		}
